```{r}
library("modelsummary")
data <- data.frame(anscombe)
print(anscombe)

a <- lm(y1~x1, data)
b <- lm(y2~x2, data)
c <- lm(y3~x3, data)
d <- lm(y4~x4, data)

liste <- list(a, b, c, d)
modelsummary(liste)
```
```{r}
data <- CO2
print(data)

a <- lm(uptake~conc, data)
b <- lm(uptake~log10(conc), data)

liste <- list(a, b)
modelsummary(liste, estimate  = "{estimate}{stars}")
```
